originalText.text: I first met Rachael 9 years ago and have not let anyone else touch my hair since! Rachael does it all - my balayage, roots, cut and keratin treatments. She is truly an expert at what she does and takes so much pride in her work - everything you would want in a trusted hair stylist. I’ve recommended so many people to Rachael (family, friends, coworkers) and they all love her as well. The March & Pearl Salon is in the best location with incredible vibes and always such an enjoyable experience!

originalText.text: I've been seeing Michelle for my hair for years and I am always thrilled with the results! She knows exactly what my hair needs and listens to my desired outcome. I've also seen her work on other clients who have had very different coloring and styles - and they all look fabulous! I highly recommend Michelle!

text.text: I've been seeing Michelle for my hair for years and I am always thrilled with the results! She knows exactly what my hair needs and listens to my desired outcome. I've also seen her work on other clients who have had very different coloring and styles - and they all look fabulous! I highly recommend Michelle!

originalText.text: I love March & Pearl! I have been getting my hair colored by Rachael for the past 9 years. She is amazing at giving you the color you want. I am so happy I found someone I can trust with my hair.

text.text: I love March & Pearl! I have been getting my hair colored by Rachael for the past 9 years. She is amazing at giving you the color you want. I am so happy I found someone I can trust with my hair.

originalText.text: I have been going to Michelle for the past 2+ years for blonde coloring and she is amazing! Always delivers on what I am going for and takes the time to understand what her clients want. Her new space is beautiful and conveniently located in the heart of the west village.

text.text: I have been going to Michelle for the past 2+ years for blonde coloring and she is amazing! Always delivers on what I am going for and takes the time to understand what her clients want. Her new space is beautiful and conveniently located in the heart of the west village.

originalText.text: Back in 2018, I was making the daunting search for a new hair stylist and booked consults with countless options before choosing Michelle. Since then, I've followed her to 3 different salons and couldn't be more elated for her to start her own. Michelle has taken me from my natural brunette to low maintenance blonde after years and years of thinking I could never pull off the color. She makes fantastic product recommendations for my hair type (fine and curly) and has been so kind advising me through some health issues that have resulted in hair loss. As an added bonus, I always have lots of fun with Michelle at the salon chatting about everything from reality tv to skiing to halloween costumes to the best tea, which is important when you're spending several hours together! I can't recommend Michelle highly enough, plus March & Pearl is in the cutest neighborhood in town, and I love having an excuse to go there and spend an afternoon.
